content: What is the status of http://www.healthintersections.com.au/?p=2580 - has any of it made its way into the spec?
no. no take up from anyone. It's on my list to add to my server at some stage
Well, we added the TestReport resource to the spec... we're working on implementing that.
that's true, we did do that part.
It's my intent to extend my server to support aggregation of test report data. But that'll be in December sometime
Got it, thanks. Pretty keen to see this idea of test resources / operations on production instances in action
